attributes.action: Stop teachers (English) from being able to say The N word in literature
attributes.additional_details: As a black person it is a sickening sound when a white teacher says N-word with out flinching so it should not be allowed to be said at all I would understand if that teacher is black but when a white teacher says it it is sickening
attributes.background:
Stop English teachers from being able to say the n word whilst reading to the class
It is already morally incorrect and incorrect when you say it elsewhere so why should they be able to say it whilst reading?

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The Government aren't responsible for the specific words people - including teachers - use, but it is already illegal to discriminate or abuse on the grounds of race.

If you want to complain about the behaviour of a teacher you should raise this with your parents or headteacher.
